ActWeights and Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Weights and Measures Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the WEIGHTS AND MEASURES REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to address concerns raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations to correct inconsistencies between the English and French versions of the Regulations and clarify certain sections.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0017 Publication Date: 2017-02-22
